headline: Here is Why Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX) is Highly Favored by Hedge Funds
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) is one of the 10 best healthcare equipment stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On February 17, the price target on Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) was reduced from $112 to $109 by Canaccord Genuity analyst William Plovanic. The analyst reiterated his Buy rating on the stock, which still yields a […]

headline: Boston Scientific elects Cathy Smith and Christophe Weber to Board of Directors
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) announced today the election of Cathy Smith and Christophe Weber to its Board of Directors, effective February 18, 2026.
